name: Zombie Murderer:Kill Them All
description:
Zombie murderer is a game that combines action and Parkour. 

The simple operation and the refreshing feeling of attack make you feel incredible. 

Come and challenge the task constantly to compete with your friends. 

There are more artworks for you to collect. 

Don't forget to collect these artworks in the game!
